newsitem.title: USA: Les Belf leaves EVEREN Securities - firm spokesman.
newsitem.headline: Les Belf leaves EVEREN Securities - firm spokesman.

text.p: Leslie Belf, senior vice president and manager of municipal commitments at Everen Securities Inc, left the firm Tuesday "to pursue other interests," a company spokesman said.
EVEREN spokesman Ted McDougal declined to say what events led to Belf's departure.
"Beyond just confirming that he is leaving to pursue other opportunities I am just not going to go any further," McDougal said.
Chicago-based EVEREN announced Belf's hiring on Sept 12, 1995. Belf worked in EVEREN's New York office.
